name: Jimer
description:
Jump to planes and collect points. Crunch for red clock and jump above yellow clock

Movement

Use virtual joystick to movement. 

Press and held down button to crunch. 

Firstly, I and @Ismail interested in programming side of development. Therefore, graphics and color selection may ugly sorry for that :/ .   

Also you can reach source code of this game on GitHub and you can contribute. here Notice me if you made better.
